name: Goodie Assembly
description:
Goodie Assembly is a relaxing casual puzzle game. Slices appear and move toward the center from 8 different directions. As a player,  you try to get 8 slices to meet in order to assemble a delicious goodie (tasty food) and make sure that the slices don't stack up too many times or the game will be over. 

This is my first public demo. The full version will be published on App Store and Play Store with more content:

  • Relax with casual mode or have an intense experience with nightmare mode.
  • Collect dozens of delicious goodies.

Instructions:

Keyboard: Press left/right to rotate; space to speed up moving slices.

Mouse/Touch: Tap either side to rotate accordingly; tap on moving slices to speed them up.

All comments and feedback are welcomed!
